templates.name: Incident Report Form
templates.description: Comprehensive incident documentation form for security incidents including theft, assault, fire, medical emergencies. Includes witness details, timeline, and evidence checklist.

templates.name: CCTV Access Register
templates.description: Log for tracking who accesses CCTV recordings. Required for chain of custody and audit compliance. Includes purpose of access, files accessed, and supervisor approval.

templates.name: Section 65B / BSA 63 Certificate
templates.description: Certificate template for authenticating electronic evidence (CCTV footage) for court admissibility. Updated for Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam 2023.

templates.name: Chain of Custody Log
templates.description: Evidence handling log for CCTV footage and physical evidence. Tracks every handover from extraction to court submission.

templates.name: Visitor Management Log
templates.description: Daily visitor register with photo/ID capture fields. Includes host details, purpose of visit, and badge return tracking.

templates.name: Contractor Access Form
templates.description: Pre-authorisation form for contractor/vendor access. Includes safety briefing acknowledgment, tool/equipment list, and work area specification.

templates.name: Guard Patrol Log
templates.description: Hourly patrol documentation with checkpoint verification. Includes observation notes, anomaly reporting, and patrol route tracking.

templates.name: Shift Handover Report
templates.description: End-of-shift documentation for guard handover. Covers pending issues, equipment status, and key events during shift.

templates.name: Key Issue Register
templates.description: Log for tracking key issuance and return. Covers all keys, access cards, and secure area passes.

templates.name: Security Audit Checklist
templates.description: Comprehensive 50-point audit checklist covering physical security, CCTV, access control, fire safety, and documentation compliance.

templates.name: Emergency Contact Card
templates.description: Wallet-sized emergency contact card for guards. Includes police, fire, medical, and company emergency contacts.

templates.name: Vehicle Entry/Exit Log
templates.description: Log for tracking vehicle movement in and out of premises. Includes driver details, purpose, and material movement.
